snippet: The Gibbs Quadski is a machine easily mistaken for an all-terrain vehicle, but it’s built to go places that A.T.V.’s won’t, like across a lake.
abstract: Gibbs Quadski is newest offering from Gibbs Sports Amphibians, privately held company devoted solely to development of vehicles that can travel on land and water; Quadski is first sports amphibian capable of being driven at high speed on both land and water.
lead_paragraph: The Gibbs Quadski is a machine easily mistaken for an all-terrain vehicle, but it’s built to go places that A.T.V.’s won’t, like across a lake.

headline.seo: After Romping in Mud, You Can Take It for a Bath
headline.main: After Romping in the Mud, You Can Take It for a Bath
headline.print_headline: After Romping in the Mud, You Can Take It for a Bath
